Yeah, that's absolutely awesome. So when you look back at 2023, what stuck out to you? What was anomalous? And the reason why I asked that question is because you've seen a lot of markets, right? So I started trading in 2007 myself, and I know that you've seen much more than I have. So I'm always curious to see what kind of things stuck out to different people with different reference ranges. I think I guess the two major things I noticed was that I completely would have never predicted that the stock market would be almost at new highs at the end of the year.
